casebody.data:
Thai HAI, Appellant, v. Les BROWNLEE, Acting Secretary of the Army, Appellee. No. 03-1325. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Dec. 3, 2003.

Before MICHEL, LOURIE and LINN, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
